title: Getting started with your own landing page
text: Now that you know the value of a landing page, it's time to start creating one. You donâ€™t need a whole village to go live! You can create a landing page on your own, without depending on your go-to-marketing team, design, or IT Team. Not only does it reduce the time to go live, but it works right of the box. Onboard your team faster, explore power-packed features and launch stunning landing pages.
